ComicInfo.Title: A Deal With Darkoth; The Golden Apples of Immortality
ComicInfo.Summary:
A Deal With Darkoth: Mephisto sends Darkoth to kill Donald Blake. Darktoth resists Mephisto long enough to allow Blake to turn into Thor, who helps Darkoth gain his freedom from Mephisto.
The Golden Apples of Immortality: Loki and Tyr capture Idunn and the golden apples of Asgard.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:35:01. [Issue ID 36851]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Fantastic Four [Thing,Brenda Barclay,Desmond Pitt's son,Dr. Doom (flashback,Nurse Stevens (cameo),Darkoth [Desmond Pitt],Invisible Girl] (flashback,Human Torch,cameo),Tom Barclay,Mephisto,Thor,Mr. Fantastic
